SEARCH
Package com.example.cmput301_team_project.db

Class UserDatabaseService

java.lang.Object
com.example.cmput301_team_project.db.BaseDatabaseService
com.example.cmput301_team_project.db.UserDatabaseService
public class UserDatabaseService extends BaseDatabaseService
the UserDatabaseService singleton class includes methods for making queries on the "users" collection in the firestore database. Provides methods on logging in, signing out, and registering users, as well as relational data from one user to another such as following, searching, etc.

  • Field Summary

    • setInstanceForTesting

      public static void setInstanceForTesting(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db, Executor executor)
      Sets up a custom Firebase db and executor for testing purposes. Overrides the singleton instance of UserDatabaseService.
      Parameters:
      db - The Firestore instance to be used.
      executor - The Executor to handle the Firestore operations during the tests.

    • addUser

      Adds a user to the firebase db.
      Parameters:
      user - The AppUser to be added to the db.
      Returns:
      A void Task if the addition to the db is successful, or an exception if unsuccessful.

    • getDisplayName

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<String> getDisplayName(String username)
      Gets the users display name.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user.
      Returns:
      A Task containing a String with the user's display name if successful, otherwise an exception is thrown.

    • validateCredentials

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Boolean> validateCredentials(String username, String inputPassword)
      Validates a user's credentials by checking the hashed password. This method retrieves the stored password hash and salt from Firestore, hashes the input password with the same salt, and compares the results.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user.
      inputPassword - The password entered by the user.
      Returns:
      A Task that resolves to true if the password matches, otherwise false.

    • userExists

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Boolean> userExists(String username)
      Checks if a user exists in the Firestore database.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check.
      Returns:
      A Task that resolves to true if the user exists, otherwise false.

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      currentUser - username of the user making the search
      query - search query
      Returns:
      A Task that resolves to a list of users matching the query

      Parameters:
      username - username of the user whose followers the query searches in
      query - search query
      Returns:
      A Task that resolves to a list of followers of the user matching the query

    • userFollowingSearch

      Searches for users followed by a given user in the database
      Parameters:
      username - username of the user whose following the query searches in
      query - search query
      Returns:
      A Task that resolves to a list of users followed by the user matching the query
